description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Zombies have overrun the city(again!). As a sniper for the US army, your mission is to contain the zombie threat before it becomes a brain-fest.  Expect hours of heart-pounding, zombie-shooting fun, with realistic sniping action, and 3 game modes to choose from!
description.short: Zombies have overrun the city(again!). As a sniper for the US army, your mission is to contain the zombie threat before it becomes a brain-fest.  Expect hours of heart-pounding, zombie-shooting fun, with realistic sniping action, and 3 game modes to choose from!
